result.html: Bail ó Dhia oraibhGod bless you.
result.ponchtml: Bail ó Ḋia oraiḃGod bless you.

result.ga: Bail ó Dhia ar an obair
result.orig: Bail ó Dhia ar an obair
result.html: Bail ó Dhia ar an obairGod bless the work.
result.ponchtml: Bail ó Ḋia ar an obairGod bless the work.

result.eng: He felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.
result.ga: Bhí truaigh an tsaoil aige do Mhicheál Dubh agus don bhail a chuir an bhantracht air

result.html: Bhí truaigh an tsaoil aige do Mhicheál Dubh agus don bhail a chuir an bhantracht airHe felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí truaiġ an tsaoil aige do Ṁiċeál Duḃ agus don ḃail a ċuir an ḃantraċt airHe felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.
